item.title: Let's Kill This MacBook! - How to Mine Monero on a Mac
item.description: MacBook Pro 13 without TouchBar My good friend’s Mac is nearing its end He’s already had it, the one in the picture above, for a couple of years, and the battery is starting to degrade among several other serious issues. Since it is nearing its end soon, in the time that it isn’t being used it could mine some cryptocurrency. MacBooks are known for their subpar cooling systems as demonstrated in this video.
